About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

Current Software Engineer since 2021. Previous Cyber Security Specialist from 2016. I enjoy keeping up with the latest technologies, including AI and blockchain. I'm most experienced with Java, Python, and JavaScript; I also know a bit of C and C++. I hope to one day design and manage a data lake for machine learning projects. My hobbies include snowboarding, rock climbing and jiu jitsu. Game of Thrones fan.

US Navy

Petty Officer First Class

Trained in networking and cyber security. Familiar with forensic tools Wireshark and Splunk to analyze network traffic. Experienced in cyber threat intelligence.

Regis University

B.S. Computer Science

ABET accredited. 4.0 GPA. Graduated March 2021.

Regis University

M.S. Data Science

Specialization in Data Engineering. 4.0 GPA. Graduated May 2023.
